mapper.select: SELECT Notice.*,employee.emp_name writer_emp_name FROM Notice,Employee WHERE Notice.writer_emp_no=employee.emp_no ORDER BY notice_no DESC
mapper.insert: Insert into MBMS.NOTICE (notice_no, notice_subject, notice_content, writer_emp_no, notice_date) values (Notice_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{noticeSubject}, #{noticeContent} , #{writerEmpNo} , SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT Notice.*,employee.emp_name writer_emp_name FROM Notice,Employee WHERE Notice.writer_emp_no=employee.emp_no) WHERE notice_no=#{noticeNo}
